title: More Complex Role

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player each night. For each ability and attribute they have, the host comes up with another unnecessarily complex one that's somewhat related to the role, and that player gains those abilities and attributes.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - This does not count as a conversion for mechanical purposes.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Cause at least 5 abilities and 5 attributes to be given out total.

desc:
Post 2835
*Hello yes <#970046125065265202> please make `m o r e` complex roles thank you bye*
